definition: to concede as true or valid
to allow entry (as to a place, fellowship, or privilege)
examples: an open window had admitted rain

definition: to accept into a hospital as an inpatient
examples: he was admitted last night for chest pains

definition: a person who is admitted into a school, hospital, etc.
examples: When a patient is transferred, the nurse will take the next new admit—unless her patient is transferred to a hospital for only a temporary stay.
